TextBody: Hello, Thank you for reaching out to us. I will add our colleague Oana to assist you with the renewal. Oana, FYI We are trying to get our licensing renewed for 1 year. Our reseller BCN (shaun.fielding@bcn.co.uk) has been trying to get a quote but apparently cannot get a response. Our current license has expired already and we only have 18 days to renew before we lose functionality. Please can someone contact Shaun and get our license quote sorted? Best regards, Alin Anca Technical Support Engineer Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix - DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption CoSoSys Ltd www.endpointprotector.com ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0ChCTd:ref
Subject: Licensing    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0ChCTd:ref ]
